description.narrative: The project aims to achieve the following key outcomes: (1) Providing improved evidence‑based policy inputs supporting a pro-poor trade agenda; (2) Building institutional coordination of trade and development; (3) Technical reinforcement of human resources for trade and development; (4) Strengthening the national and institutional management capacity to implement the strategies and policies related to trade; and (5) Cabo Verde mobilizes resources to implement the Diagnostic Trade Integration Study (DTIS).

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Tourism, Investments and Entrepreneurial Development/ General Directorate of Industry and Trade / NIU EIF

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
